text_logic_form: Line $AD$ is a median of triangle $ABC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Line $AD$ is a median of triangle $ABC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BD$ is $4x+9$ units.
The measure of angle $ADC$ is $7x - 6$ degrees.
The length of the line $CD$ is $7x - 6$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BC$, forming a triangle $ABC$.
Line $AD$ is a median of the triangle, dividing it into two smaller triangles $ABD$ and $ACD$.
Lines $BD$ and $CD$ are the segments of the median.

point_positions.D: Point D is positioned at (147.0, 80.0) and is a point on the line $BC$.
